Goodbye

01 January, 2021

It's finally time for me to walk away from the web. There is no longer nothing for me there. Only exhaustion, exasperation, and continuous rejection. I'm tired, I'm defeated, I'm empty.

It's not fun anymore. It is time for me to go.
